result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Rose M Thomas

records.addlTxt: Status conference on November 29, 2022 at 11:30 am.

Court reporter Trisch Clark. Defendant Rose M Thomas in court.  Attorney Gary Raymond George Aty in court for Rose M Thomas.  Attorney Colleen Lennon in court for State of Wisconsin. Information was E-filed with the court and a copy was given to the defendant; Defendant waived reading of Information; Defendant stood mute, Court enters plea of Not Guilty; motions due in 20 days; bail continued. 

DE was taken to the PSB to complete the booking process.

Status conference on June 13, 2022 at 01:20 pm.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall report to the Dane County Jail to complete the booking/fingerprinting process within 10 days of today. 
- Defendant shall not be at any Walmart in Dane County. 
Parties stipulated to waive the time limits for Preliminary Hearing. 
Trial Judge - Br 17 

Defendant has acknowledged and agreed to terms and conditions of bond. Defendant must return signed bond form within 10 days of today. Any bail money previously posted will not be returned until a signed bond form is on file with the Clerk of Courts.

09:49 AM Defendant appeared.  Robin W Lee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  All parties by Zoom. The defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.  Status conference scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 01:20 pm.
